participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, loves to reminisce about the past and enjoys artistic activities.
participant_1.background: my favorite toy as a child was my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80s. i love new kids on the block.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, enjoys fun activities and has a vibrant personality.
participant_2.background: i am in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i play with my friends on the playground.
